long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en_GB,en_US,es_4:
Crunchbase Search Scraper helps you scrape companies, people, investors, acquisitions, and more from Crunchbase search results. 

ğŸš€ HOW IT WORKS:
1. Search for the leads you want on Crunchbase.
2. Click the "Export" button to start scraping.
3. Download business leads in CSV or Excel format.

ğŸ“™ FEATURES:
- Scrape up to unlimited Crunchbase search results.
- Scrape all search types, including people, companies, investors, acquisitions, funding, hubs, events, contacts, schools.
- Supports filter mode and query builder mode pages.
- Scrape organization's stock symbol, LinkedIn, website, Twitter, Facebook, contact email, and phone number.
- Scrape person's LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, gender, job title, and investment information.
- Search exactly what you want and filter the results.
- Save and download search results in CSV, Excel, or JSON format.
- Continuous free updates.

ğŸ“Š COMPANY DATA FIELDS

#Basic Information
Short Description, Description, Founded, Closed, Company Type, Operational Status, Revenue Range

##Social & Contact Information
Website, Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Contact Email, Phone Number

##IPO
Stock Symbol, IPO Status, Listed, Delisted, IPO Valuation, IPO Raised, Stock Exchange Symbol

##Investors
Number of Major Investors, Number of Investors, Investor Type, Investment Stage

##Acquisitions
Number of Acquisitions, Acquisition Status, Acquisition Identifier, Acquisition Price, Acquisition Announcement Date, Acquisition By, Acquisition Type

##Investments
Exit Date, Number of Diversified Focused Investments, Number of Exits, Number of Exits via IPO, Number of Diversified Focused Investments

##Funding
Number of Financing Rounds, Financing Stage, Last Financing Date, Last Financing Total, Last Financing Type, Last Equity Financing Total, Last Equity Financing Type, Equity Financing Total, Financing Total

##Technology
SEMRush, builtwith

ğŸ“ NOTICE
The extension does not provide bypassing the crunchbase paywall. You must be a crunchbase pro member to extract more than 15 leads.

ğŸ‘‹ FAQ
If you have any questions, please get in touch with us at help@niomaker.com.

ğŸ”’ DATA PRIVACY
All data is processed locally on your computer and never passes through our web servers, so no one knows what you save.

ğŸ’¡ DISCLAIMER
Crunchbase Scraper is not endorsed by or affiliated with Crunchbase, Inc., which is registered in the US and other countries. Crunchbase is a trademark of Crunchbase, Inc.

long.en,en_AU:
Crunchbase Search Scraper helps you scrape companies, people, investors, acquisitions, and more from Crunchbase search results. 

ğŸš€ HOW IT WORKS:
1. Search for the leads you want on Crunchbase.
2. Click the "Export" button to start scraping.
3. Download business leads in CSV or Excel format.

v1.3.0 CHANGE LOG
- Boost mode: 1000 rows a time
- Boost mode is in beta and may export more than 1000 rows. Not sure when it will be fixed.

v1.2.0 CHANGE LOG
- Support export from saved search & lists
- Support export from shared tags
- Fix the non-English the wrong max number issue

v1.1.1 CHANGE LOG
- 50x faster export
- Add more fields, please open the edit table view to check all fields that you want to export
- Accurate revenue and total funding, original currency preserved
- Add location with city, region and country

ğŸ“™ FEATURES:

long.nl:
Crunchbase Search Scraper helpt u bedrijven, personen, investeerders, overnames en meer te scrapen uit de zoekresultaten van Crunchbase.

ğŸš€ HOE HET WERKT:
1. Zoek naar de leads die u wilt op Crunchbase.
2. Klik op de knop "Exporteren" om te beginnen met scrapen.
3. Download zakelijke leads in CSV- of Excel-formaat.

v1.1.1 WIJZIGINGSLOGBOEK
- 50x snellere export
- Voeg meer velden toe, open de bewerkingstabelweergave om alle velden te controleren die u wilt exporteren
- Nauwkeurige omzet en totale financiering, oorspronkelijke valuta behouden
- Voeg locatie toe met stad, regio en land

ğŸ“™ FUNCTIES:
- Scrap tot onbeperkte Crunchbase-zoekresultaten.
- Scrap alle zoektypen, inclusief personen, bedrijven, investeerders, overnames, financiering, hubs, evenementen, contacten, scholen.
- Ondersteunt filtermodus en querybuildermoduspagina's.
- Scrap het aandelensymbool van de organisatie, LinkedIn, website, Twitter, Facebook, contact-e-mailadres en telefoonnummer. - Schraap LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, geslacht, functietitel en investeringsinformatie van een persoon.
- Zoek precies wat u wilt en filter de resultaten.
- Sla zoekresultaten op en download ze in CSV-, Excel- of JSON-formaat.
- Continue gratis updates.
